extend = lambda v: hstack([0, v, 0])
def dw_dt(t, w):
    u = extend(w[:m-1])
    z = w[m-1:]
    du_dt = Dx @ z
    dz_dt = c**2 * (Dx @ u)
    return hstack([chop(du_dt), dz_dt])
